channel.title: HTML Help

item.title: HTML Help
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

If you have spaces in your website then go in to your css and add this:

* {
padding:0;
margin:0;
}

add this before everything else so there is no random spaces which will interfere with your coding. This is a standard thing coders do when they are building a site from scratch, its like the first thing you write into your CSS.

However, your codes are telling me that your using wordpress to store your images. You could just stick to using wordpress overall for your homepage.

Read full topic
